<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106293</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106293</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101329</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Earth's Outlook from Above</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aussicht der Masse von oben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les perspectives de la terre d'en haut</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Outlook da terra de acima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prospettiva della terra da sopra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γήινη προοπτική από ανωτέρω</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Perspectiva de la tierra de arriba</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Fifty years after Sputnik, satellites peering down on Earth have become valuable scientific tools to study the global environment and offer much needed insight into the future of our planet.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fünfzig Jahre nach Sputnik, haben die 
Satelliten, die unten auf Masse blicken, die gewordenen wertvollen 
wissenschaftlichen Hilfsmittel, zum der globalen Umgebung zu studieren
und des dringend benötigten Einblickes in die Zukunft unseres 
Planeten anzubieten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cinquante ans après Sputnik, les satellites 
dévisageant vers le bas sur terre ont les outils scientifiques 
valables devenus pour étudier l'environnement global et pour offrir 
l'perspicacité si nécessaire dans le futur de notre planète.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cinqüênta anos após Sputnik, os satélites que
perscrutam para baixo na terra têm as ferramentas científicas 
valiosas tornadas para estudar o ambiente global e para oferecer a 
introspecção tão necessária no futuro de nosso planeta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cinquanta anni dopo Sputnik, i satelliti che 
scrutano giù sulla terra hanno strumenti scientifici importanti 
diventati per studiare l'ambiente globale e per offrire la 
comprensione tanto necessaria nel futuro del nostro pianeta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πενήντα έτη μετά από σπούτνικ, οι δορυφόροι που 
κοιτάζουν αδιάκριτα κάτω στη γη έχουν γίνει πολύτιμα 
επιστημονικά εργαλεία για να μελετήσουν το παγκόσμιο περιβάλλον 
και να προσφέρουν πολλή αναγκαία διορατικότητα στο μέλλον του 
πλανήτη μας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cincuenta años después de Sputnik, los 
satélites que miran con fijeza abajo en la tierra tienen herramientas
científicas valiosas convertidas para estudiar el ambiente global y 
para ofrecer la penetración muy necesaria en el futuro de nuestro 
planeta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>

        </lifeCycle>

        <educational>

        <rights>

            <value>yes</value>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
